column4:
……すみません。
ちょっと考え事を。

何か悩みごとでも、
あるんですか？

ただ、最強のマリオネーション
ギアとは何か？
……つい考えてしまいまして。
column5: I was just wondering what the strongest Marionation Gear would be like...
column11: I was just wondering what the strongest Marionation Gear would be like...

column4:
（……やっぱり……マリオネー
　ションギアのこと……）
column5: (...So he was thinking about Marionation Gear...)
column11: (...So he was thinking about Marionation Gear...)

column4:
（男って、どうしてこう人形が
　好きなんだろうねぇ……）
column5: (Why are men so obsessed with Puppets...?)
column11: (Why are men so obsessed with mechs...?)

column4:
なになに。
最強の人形？
それは、おもしろい話だな。

最強とは何か？
いまだに、その答えを得た
人形師はいない。
column5: What makes something {the strongest}? To this day, no one has come up with a good answer.
column11: What makes something the strongest contender? To this day, no one has come up with a good answer.

column4:
最強ってのは、
男のロマンだよな。
column5: {The strongest} anything is a man's romantic dream.

column4:
私が銃を扱うのも、
強さを求めてのこと。
column5: I also like using guns, so I'm after power.
column11: I also like using guns, so I'm after power.

column4:
私自身、他の人形師より、
最強へのこだわりが強いんです。
column5: I, personally, am convinced that the strongest Puppet will be the one that has the most brute force.
column11: More than any of the other Puppet Makers, I, personally, am convinced that the strongest mech will be the one that has the most brute force.

column4:
（……単に銃が好きなだけって
　気もするけど……）
column5: (...In other words, he thinks guns are a must just because he likes them...)
column11: (...In other words, he thinks guns are a must, just because he likes them...)

column4:
ふんふん。
確かに、遠くから攻撃できる分、
弾工房の人形は有利だよな。
column5: Heh. It's true the Bullet Workshop's Puppets have an advantage since they can strike from a distance.
column11: Heh. It's true that the Bullet Workshop's mechs have an advantage since they can strike from a far distance.

column4:
でも、それだけじゃ、
最強とはいえない
気がするぜ。
column5: But that alone isn't enough to make them the strongest.
column11: But, that alone isn't enough to call them the strongest.

column4:
飛び道具だって、銃とか
ミサイルとか、それぞれに
長所と短所があるしな。
column5: All ranged weapons, like guns and missiles, have their pros and cons.
column11: Any ranged weapons, such as guns or missiles, will have their own pros and cons.

column4:
その通り。
ならば、どうするか？
column5: Exactly. So what can we do about that?
column11: Exactly. So, what can be done about that?

column4: すべての武器を装備する！

column5: A missile launcher on the shoulder!
column11: A missile launcher on the shoulder!

column4:
しかも、
ある程度の格闘能力も
そなえる。
column5: On top of that, it can even handle hand-to-hand combat to a certain extent.
column11: What's more, it can also handle hand-to-hand combat to a certain extent.

column4:
これこそ複合銃士！
完全無欠の人形の姿！
column5:
It's the Multi-Gunslinger!
A perfect and flawless Puppet!
column11:
It's a Multi-Gunslinger!
A perfect and flawless mech!

column4:
……だと
思ったんですけどね……。
どうも、しっくりこなくて……。
column5: Please tell me if you think it's accurate...
column11: Please, tell me if you think it's accurate...

column4:
そうだ。
よかったら、模擬戦をして
もらえませんか？
column5: Well, okay. If you'd like, why don't we have a mock battle?
column11: Oh, right. If you'd like, why don't we have a mock battle?

column4: 戦ってみれば、何かわかるかも。
column5: You might get a better sense of it.
column11: You might get a better sense of it.
